tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** *** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ********I had visited him for the first time when my less than a month old daughter had suddenly developed rashes all over the body, his precise diagnosis & to the point medication enabled her recover within 24 hrs. 
The accessibility to Dr Jay Kishore is worth a million bucks! We have never had any issues getting my kid in when she needed to see him and have always felt very confident in his care.
The best thing about him is that he never prescribes unnecessary medication. He has been my daughter's pediatrician from the first time we had visited him till date(my daughter is now 3).
reply_text: Yourparenting is too good.Your acknowledgement gives me encouragement.Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I've been knowing Dr Jay kishore since last 10 years. I m fortunate to have him as paediatrician of my twins right from their birth. he has taken care of all the major and minor ailments of my kids right from their birth when my kids were born at Railway hospital to my sons admission at Ganga ram hospital.he is quite a patient friendly and soft spoken person and genuinely guides parents quite well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a very positive experience with Dr Jai kishore and would like to give a special thanks to him for taking care my child's health. He is so kind and humble. He used to give a detailed counselling that I liked the Most.. He is carrying and his utmost concern is your comfort.
Highly recommended.. :)
reply_text: Thanks for your words of appreciation!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Neonatal Nursing,Childhood Infections,Pediatric Vaccinations,Nutrition in Children,Child nutrition Guidance,
review: Dr. JayKishore is phenomenal in his line of work. We were consulting with him since the first day our daughter was born. He is extremely gentle, polite and very friendly. He remains calm even while dealing with critical situations. I’d recommend him.

tags: None
review: *** *** ******* ** *** **** ****** *** **** ****** He is very polite and always listen to your problems , you can contact him at any point time and you will find him available for the required support and help.  He is like a god for me and my family,  he has treated my son in the best possible way and extended his support and cooperation always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** **** ************** He is excellent when it comes to diagnosis of child's condition , **** *** ****** ********** and explained us all about the correct way to care for the infant. We are extremely grateful for the guidance and support of Dr. Jaikishore. Thanks a lot doctor.

tags: None
review: ** ** *** ** *** **** ************** *** shows compassion &  care with a smile. Fully Dedicated, ready to help, even if he has to go out of the way.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: As the parent, we were concerned about a recurring fever with our son. The doctor is very patient and gave enough time to our queries and answered them sufficiently. The advice helped in recovery and stopped further recurrence.

tags: None
review: ** *** ******* *** ** **** ****** *** ********* **** ** ** **** *** ** ** * Very polite and always listens to the parents of child. Thank You so much sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We waited for little long and later on, we came to know he was attending one patient in emergency. Anyway, doctor is well experienced, friendly and most important he was listening all the problems one by one without making any rush for the long queue outside his cabin. He answered all my concerns with proper explanation. He is very gentle person I would say. Happy and satisfied with doctor Jay Kishor.
